You kids with yer fancy space stations! Back in my day we carried all our fuel and we liked it! If we wanted to have a permanent presence in space, WE HAD TO LAND ON THE MUN! CAN YOU SAY THAT YOU'VE PERMANENTLY STAYED ON THE MUN?!?!?!?!
